result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael M. KNIER was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Fraud Against Financial Institution as repeater (Value Exceeds $500 but does not Exceed $10,000) [Modifiers: Repeater], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.82(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Maintain fulltime employment or work search.

Pay supervision fees in an amount to be determined by the Department of Corrections.

No leaving or changing employment without disclosure to the agent and with agent's approval.

No contact with Collins State Bank.

Provide DNA sample and pay the surcharge.

timeConds.notes: Under the Huber Law, commencing immediately.

supervisions.notes: concurrent with Case Nos. 09 CF 137 and 10 CF 283.

superMiscConds.notes: Maintain full-time employment or work search.

No leaving or changing of employment without disclosure to the agent and with agents approval. 

No contact with Collins State Bank.

Pay supervision fees to be determined by DOC.

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

charges.descr: Fraud Against Financial Institution as repeater (Value Exceeds $500 but does not Exceed $10,000)

records.addlTxt:
MOTION TO MODIFY BAIL - 
Defendant in custody.
Parties argue the motion.  The Court denies the motion.
State to draft order.
Minutes.
Notice of Motion and Motion to Modify Bond.
Defendant's Notice of Motion; Defendant's Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.

Defendant in custody.   
Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 3 for further proceedings.  Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.   
ARRAIGNMENT 
Information filed.  Not guilty plea.  Jury Calendar.  Settlement conference with the District Attorney is set for 07-21-15 at 4:00 p.m.   Plea date is set for 11-20-15 at 8:30 a.m.   State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.   
Counsel have a stipulation to modify bail to $200.00 cash.  Court will so modify.  
Amended Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail.   Copy filed.   
Minutes.

Defendant in custody.   
Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.   Preliminary hearing is set for 07-08-15 at 1:30 p.m.   
Court sets bail at $1,000.00 cash with the condition that defendant must report to the Manitowoc County Sheriff's Department for photographs, fingerprints and other identifying information.   Bail not furnished.  Defendant is remanded to the county jail.  Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued.   Copy filed.   
Minutes.

RE:  Collins State Bank, between 04-05-15 and 04-12-15.
Initial appearance is set for 06-29-15 at 2:30 p.m.
